channel.title: Experience on Deepak Kumar Mahana
channel.description: Recent content in Experience on Deepak Kumar Mahana

item.title: Wipro Technologies
item.description: Joined Wipro Technologies in October 2021 as a Cloud & DevOps Engineer in the Hybrid Platform Team. This team is responsible for managing infrastructure in both on-premise and cloud. Some responsiblities as part of this roles are: Managing over 120+ subscriptions in Azure using Terraform (Open Source) and Azure Repos as central repository for management Build and Support Infrastructure services like Virtual Machines, Storage, Virtual Network, Log Analytics, Automation Account, Kubernetes Cluster, Container Registry Create and manage DevOps pipelines for continuous management of infra services using Infrastructure as Code.

item.title: Tata Consultancy Services
item.description: Joined Tata Consultancy Services as a fresher in March 2015. Started as a Windows Server Administrator and gradually worked towards Cloud Infrastructure. Worked across various teams and technologies. Few roles and responisbilities during my journey in TCS Cloud & DevOps Engineer Setup RBAC roles for multiple scopes in Azure (subscription/resource group/resources) using groups. Create PowerShell scripts to build multiple VMs in Azure. Create ARM Templates to standardize builds in Azure.
